column6: Daredevil's search for the truth leads him out of the country, on a swashbuckling noir adventure that hasn't been seen in the pages of DD for years! But, is this the other DD, or the original?
column8: | penciller (cover):Lee Bermejo | writer:Ed Brubaker | colorist:Frank D'Armata | penciller:Michael Lark | letterer:Cory Petit
